definition: to step across/to stride over/to straddle/to span

sentences.english: Liujiaxia to Shaanxi Province in cross-border 330 kilovolt transformer lines and over.
sentences.chinese: 劉家峽至陝西關中330千伏變電線路跨境而過。

sentences.english: Enter the permit number for the Cross Border Commuter Permit.
sentences.chinese: 輸入“跨境通勤者許可證”的許可證號碼。

sentences.english: We will strengthen monitoring and supervision of cross-border capital flows and maintain financial stability and security.
sentences.chinese: 加強跨境資本流動監測和管理，維護金融穩定和安全。

sentences.english: Collection incentives for cross-border trade are eroded.
sentences.chinese: 對跨境貿易的徵稅動機遭到破壞。

sentences.english: The case was detected by cross-border investigation of the outbreak in Côte d'Ivoire.
sentences.chinese: 該病例是在對科特迪瓦的疫情進行跨境調查時發現的。

sentences.english: China's cross-border e-commerce bids farewell to tax-free age.
sentences.chinese: 中國的跨境電商告別免稅時代。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 emphasizes discussion of the solution to the jurisdictional conflicts in cross-border insolvency.
sentences.chinese: 第三章着重論述了跨境破產管轄權衝突的解決途徑。

sentences.english: "The cross-border capital flows are in the normal range, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，“跨境資本流動在一個正常範圍。”

sentences.english: In recent years, A significant proportion of people choose to cross-border on-line shopping.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，有相當一部分人選擇網上跨境購物。

sentences.english: This cooperation has resulted in hundreds of successful transborder investigations, the official said.
sentences.chinese: 這種合作已促使數百起跨境調查行動獲得成功。

sentences.english: Strictly speaking it's still considered a cross-border transfer.
sentences.chinese: 嚴峻來說它仍被視爲跨境轉賬。

sentences.english: We will closely monitor and control cross-border capital flows and prevent the influx of hot money.
sentences.chinese: 密切監控跨境資本流動，防範“熱錢”流入。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 focuses on China's regulation of cross-border insider trading.
sentences.chinese: 第三章中國對跨境內幕交易的法律監管。

sentences.english: Trans-border rivers are a source of livelihood for the people living along the rivers.
sentences.chinese: 跨境河流是養育沿岸人民的生命之源。

sentences.english: Cross-border training and experience is also a management- level challenge at Japanese companies.
sentences.chinese: 跨境訓練和經驗也是日本公司要面對的挑戰。

sentences.english: He would also have it or a new organization monitor cross-border financial transactions.
sentences.chinese: 他還希望它或一個新的組織能夠監控跨境金融交易。

definition: within and without the borders/domestic and foreign/home and abroad
general trade (i.e. importing and export without processing)
abbr. for 自由貿易區|自由贸易区[zi4 you2 mao4 yi4 qu1]
Belt and Road Initiative, Chinese government plan to provide finance and engineering expertise to build infrastructure across Eurasia and northeast Africa, unveiled in 2013
a port for external trade/a trading or transit post on border between countries

pinyin: wai4 shang1 zhi2 jie1 tou2 zi1

definition: e-commerce (abbr. for 電子商務|电子商务[dian4 zi3 shang1 wu4])/(old) to negotiate by telegram or telephone
